DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study demonstrate bioequivalence rate extent absorption 1600 μg selexipag test drug ( administer orally film-coated tablet 1600 μg , twice day ( b.i.d . ) 1600 μg selexipag reference drug ( administer orally 8 film-coated tablet 200 μg b.i.d . ) steady-state healthy male subject follow multiple-dose up-titration scheme .
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Male Subjects Demonstrate Bioequivalence 1600 μg Selexipag Administered Eight Tablets 200 μg Single Tablet 1600 μg
